package.name: iOSGods iAP Cracker
package.shortDescription: Free iAP Purchase for some apps and games, it doesn’t always work so don’t expect much. Turn on the tweak inside iOS Settings. This tweak is made by @Laxus for iOSGods.com, supported A12 / A13 devices!!

descriptionlist.description: Free iAP Purchase for some apps and games, it doesn’t always work so don’t expect much. Turn on the tweak inside iOS Settings. This tweak is made by @Laxus for iOSGods.com, supported A12 / A13 devices!!

You can also have
a multi-line item.
